the original generate list used the length of the file
however, the new read method gets the entire file at once

few options;
	-use a similar system to the old one. with modifications, fully integrate


	- for instance, the "next entry" might make sense to go elsewhere. If that is done, then we can go back to utilizing something similar to the old one.
	-- even better would be to integrate the contents of the loop inside the read file loop, as they might not be needed
